Articles.Content:
Hello community,

I have a problem with ksp 1.0: I can attach a fuel tank to a capsule, but then I am unable to attach an engine or another fuel tank at the bottom of the first one, does anyone knows why?

I some times have this on 1.0.2 i don`t know if ksp uses some sort of snap to grid or 

whatever. but to get stuff to attach you just move around your craft and at some point it

will snap in.
I'm having this problem and its being real difficult to work around, got to the point I couldn't build anymore and shut the game.
I believe it has to do with outdated part mods. Squad changed the way parts connect in 1.0, so some mods might be a bit buggy if not properly updated.
